holidays.title: National Daiquiri Day
holidays.description: Did you know the daiquiri was likely invented by Cuban miners?

holidays.title: National Hot Dog Day
holidays.description: When we think of summer, hot dogs come to mind almost immediately.

holidays.title: Amun Jadid
holidays.description: Observe the Amun Jadid with deep solemnity and reverence here with us today.

holidays.title: Flight Attendant Safety Professionals' Day
holidays.description: Today, we honor and recognize the hard work, dedication, and professionalism of flight attendants.

holidays.title: International Retainer Day
holidays.description: On this day we're reminded about the benefits of dental retainers and how they help us.

holidays.title: Liberation Day/FSLN Revolution Day
holidays.description: Liberation Day marked the end of the Somoza dynasty and the beginning of the Sandinista government.

holidays.title: Martyr's Day in Myanmar
holidays.description: Learn about the tragedy behind one of the most important holidays in Myanmar.

holidays.title: National Barbara Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate with Barbaras across the globe on their name day.

holidays.title: National Flitch Day
holidays.description: Join us in celebrating the lip-smacking side of bacon that is deep-rooted in tradition

holidays.title: National Football Day
holidays.description: Celebrate National Football Day by kicking a ball and scoring a goal with your friends or family.

holidays.title: National Urban Beekeeping Day
holidays.description: On National Urban Beekeeping Day, we celebrate the creatures responsible for pollination.

holidays.title: National Words with Friends Day
holidays.description: This holiday is the perfect opportunity to enjoy a game with a friend.

holidays.title: Stick Out Your Tongue Day
holidays.description: Embrace and bring out your inner child on this fun and playful holiday.

holidays.title: Take Your Poet to Work Day
holidays.description: If you've ever wished that you could spend all day with your favorite poet, today’s your day!

holidays.title: The Sandinista Revolution Day
holidays.description: Get ready to learn about the most significant conflict in Central American history.

holidays.title: aestheticfashion19’s Birthday
holidays.description: This TikTok star appreciates fashion and has impeccable taste and her style is inspiring.

holidays.title: Benedict Cumberbatch’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this highly decorated English actor, there is no way to go but up.

holidays.title: Brian May’s Birthday
holidays.description: Brian May is most known for his decades-long involvement with the iconic British rock band Queen.

holidays.title: Karl Jacobs’s Birthday
holidays.description: This Twitch star is making a name for himself in the video game streaming world.

holidays.title: Riley Curry’s Birthday

holidays.title: Shane Dawson’s Birthday
